name: proto-cam
description: Video analysis prototype with object detection

scripts.dev: npm run kill-ports && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "backend,frontend" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd api && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000 --timeout-keep-alive 300
scripts.kill-ports: lsof -ti:8000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && lsof -ti:5173 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.install:all: cd api && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: cd api && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
